My New Livejournal.


i needed a new one i just wanmted top start over.


EVERYONE ADD ME! who was my friends <3 im gonna write in it now lol


feelmyheartbeat

Its been so long sicne ive updated my journal. Yeah myspace, i remember the first time i looked that shit up lol the only reasen i wanted to be in it was because sum of my friends were and i thought it looked fun.



Lately ive been feeling really left out from my friends. 


The other day i was supposed to go out with sum friends to main street we planned to all go the day before. And so i call my friend and im at school and she says theyre leaving in a half an hour, hint im still at school.


So im like whoa u kno what either way if i wouldnt had called her they still would had went u kno? and i wouldnt had known. Even tho it was planned for me to go also.


So she said call me when u get out of school and well see what we can do? first u dont see what u can do for a friend. Its not like ure doing them a favour when u hang out with them theyre ure fucking friends


So i call after school and ask if shes going to the show that night, and shes liek yes, another thing that we all planned to go to .


So "I" had to ask if i could go. she didnt say anything. So she said shed call me later before they left. So when do i get a phone call??? the show starts at 7 and she calls at 730 and shes already on her way


"im so sorry i feel bad for not calling you, were on our way right now and ashley already left!"


"oh well thats ok i didnt feel liek going out anyway"


...................... am i the only one who thinks thats fucked up??


i mean i dunno and i always feel that im the one who has to call and make plans to do stuff. I dunno sumtimes i just wish i lived sumwhere bymyself.


and eveyday my feelings for this guy never stop growing, i like him so much, hes the sweetest most awesomest guy int he world.


I could never get a guy like that.


Im gonna start to write in my journal more, i never realized how much it made me feel better, even tho no one might read it, i still feel better


Im gonna go :)

http://www.livejournal.com/community/709_pinups/


awesome pinup site. and if ure a cam whore lol :)

i had... one of the best dreams ................. of my life last night


I was on the set of secret window (you know where this is going)

and i saw Johnny depp so me and my friend i think it was leah i cant remember walked up o him to say hi.

So we ddi and he gave leah a hug then gave me one. But not any hug............. he like grabbed my side and lifted my shirt up in the back! eeek!

so yea then we started to flirt n stuff touchy touchy yeah yeah.

then i give him another hug cuz he has to leave sumwhere so when he gives me this hug he kisses me on my NECK! 

like 3 times! so im freaken out and he says "what?" and im like ooomg i love to be kissed onthe neck SO HE DOES IT AGAIN! 


holeee shit! then later in the dream he leaves the set and asks me if i want to come to the filimg of willy wonka and im like of course!

so the dream ends with him riding off into the sunset on a horse...



*sigh* the best dream of my life

kelly osbourne was there! how crazy is that he was actually gonna go to her house and hang out with a bunch of peeps

sm crazy shit


people are getting lazy about journals. that myspace shit is getting crazy.

and to tell u the truth i think alot of people just join it so they can see how many friends they can get or yea its like a race to see who is most popular! 

give me a break


the only reasen why i joined it was becasue i saw my friend mena on it a long ass tiem ago lol

but yeah lifes been same old 

ive been babysitting or you could say puppysitting the cutest pug in the world.

his names moogie and i love him :)

O O O ! i got the cutest green blazer jacket yesterday on melrose 18 bucks man!

thats cheap lol

but yea i think im out just thought ide do a little update :)

Johnny Depp Takes Home Best Male and Uma Thurman Nabs Best Female, While Lord of the Rings Scores Best Movie 2004 MTV Movie Awards Airs June 10th at 9 P.M. (ET/PT) Kill Bill Vol. 1 slayed the competition with the most wins of the night, including Uma Thurman as "Best Female Performance" and Lucy Liu as "Best Villain." Johnny Depp took home nods for "Best Male Performance" for his dynamic role as a swashbuckler in Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl. For the third consecutive year, Lord of the Rings took home "Best Movie," for its latest installment The Return of the King. Lohan became the first Movie Awards host ever to win the coveted "golden popcorn" while hosting, as she picked up the "Breakthrough Female" award. IM OUT!

DUDE! this weekend was so bomb ok so yea friday night i went to youth group in Malibu and got DRUM LESSONS! AHHH . IT WAS SO FUN! My teacher guy said i was so good for my first time. Omg u guys have no clue what a rush it was to play. i mean i was actually playing beats i love the drums and im gonna be pro lol so yea then saturday i slept i just slept man it was so awesome. But yea so i woke up at like 11 and my dad and bro had boguth me a framed picture of marilyn monroe at the swap meet i was crying its so gorgeous. To bad i have no more room for it on my wall lol thats the picture except its in black and white! so pretty but yea uhhhhh o yea then natalie called me at like 9 and asked if i wanted to go to the movies so i was like ch ya and we saw mean girls wich may i say was better then i thought it was gonna be. And might i add anopther thing. The guy in that movie is absolutely gorgeous! hes so perfect. Me and nat were like squirming in our seats he was so hott so yea hten i came home and met sum of my bro's friends. They were very very nice Blah blah blah i slept then woke up the next morning for churchin malibu at like 9:00 and i could had swore i saw that girl from how to loose a guy in 10 days i forgot her name! but yea so i was there untill like 3 then i drove back home with ash then wen't to the bridge in ventura with ash. uhhhmmmm ok so after that was over we planned to go out to dinnuh with sum friends. but first i say lets just drive around main street. So we do and were listeing to my nu fav band the return! and me and ashley are driving up a hill in her car and we drive by and shes like " i think that was derek the lead singer of the return" and i was liek whaaat! dude thats crazy. cuz were like listeing to them lol. so we trun around and go back by to check and see if it was him and it was.! now ive never met him before or anything but all of the members of the band live with ym friend rob so it was liek ironic. so we part and go over to where they were to see what band was playen at the livery theatre. Blah blah blah i meet him (lead singer) and over and over again tell him how great he is and what a voice he has! lol and how awesome the band is so he invties me and ashley to coem back next sunday to watch his other band play "ashtray life" so im like heeeelll yea lol so then we leave to go to dinnuh with airick, lyssa, mena, and airiks friend i forgot his name lol. we went to b'js and i got pasta! yum lol so then we just chill in the parking lot and i got tried so i went home THEN! I WENT TO MELORSE IN LA!!! leah omg its like another berkley! its soooo long and has the awesomest shops like wasteland and urban outfitters omy so awesome. there were A MILLION MEMEBERS ONLY jackets! i was in heaven. sadly i couldnt find shit lol but then me and natalie drove on over across the way to hollywood blvd and went thos this vintage shop called "igunana" and i went buck wild. i got a audrey button a james dean button a EDWARD SCISSOR HANDS BUTTON! and a rocky horror picture show button! so awesome. so much fun. And so hott . but it was so fun cuz her mom let her use the beamer and we had the top down all the way lol . then on the way home through malibu we went up this crazy sand hill that me and nat havnt been to in forvere. so we stop and have a race and meet cool surfer's. and i got hoema round 9 uber fun lol. i couldnt ask for a better weekend Hope all of yall's wekend was great! im out xotiff

this is the same thing i posted in myspace..... im to lazy to write in both lol. have fun!

ddduuuuuuude i over slept!!! fudge .. now see this is exaclty the reasen why i need to drive! aaahh what am i going to do shit.

uhmm other then that this weekend has been bomb lol

ill just start with saturday since it was the most fun

woke up reeeal early (well 9) and went shopping! yay with my sister found a skirt and a pink biker girl ish jacket lol.

came home at around say uuuhhhhh  3 or 4 i dunno and when ig ot hoem i took a nap from being drained from shoppen.

woke up chilled watched tv. Then my uber great great friend Natalie calls me and asks me what im goin so i say "nuttin much" ahahahahah i made myself laugh ok ok uhhhh yea so i said that and shes like well let me call u back i have to call my friend to see whats up with her so i say okay

Calls back uhmm about 20 min later saying her other friend cant do n e thing so weeee should. and of course im like heeeeeel yea.

so we think and think and finally decide on going to main street to hang and seee a flick.

uhmm we both get ready for about 45 min then she picks me up.

we drive to main street  and while we are Natalie is trying to text wil at the same time lol. Will and texting would be a great way to tittle this night lol.

so lol when we get there shes like man where do i park so theres a spot and she rolls in... but its only 2 hour parking and were not sure how long were gonna be there.

so we ROLL OUT! ahhaha couldnt help myself. so uh yea we start driving and im like o hey i know sumwhere  we can park! so she follows my directions and i get completely confused cuz i dont know where the dam pakring place is so we drive like "away" from main street lol.

then we do a U'e and coem back she goes down the hill back to main street and i say oh there it is lol. but she drives into the bank of america parking! ahah 

so im like see that gate up there? shes like yea? im like go up there and pakr lol. haha shes like ooooooooooooooo ok i gte it now.

we park easily said and done

walk on down to main and go to the flick. Where we both decide not to see anything and just chill outside ben and jerrys. She gets i think fudge i forgot what she got! AHAHA that was ssooooo good if u didnt catch that i hope u did lol

so yea O and i get strawberry.... they didnt have sherbert!

uh oh yes.. we sit down outside with our ice creams and natalie starts to tell muah about a guy she did west side story with and sayen how hes supposed to be here tonight! so shes keepen an eye out for him.

and im like o i have a friend who lives on main street and shes like "NO WAY!" i do to! shes like whats his name! i say rob soooo sure that she doesnt know him lol! 

and shes liek OMG! i know him! and im like nooo way dude no way. thats way to coincidental. so i say few things Short film?Long hair?Director? 

lol and shes flipping out and im flipping out and then........................


Natalie is like ............ is that him?

so i turn and im like omg yes! 

so she calls him over and he says hi. Well while he is saying hi THE OTHER GUY NAT WAS LOOKING FOR CAME OVER! it was so crazy! 

omg me and natalie were going to explode from so much suprises! 

lol so we say our hellos and we meet sum of robs awesome friends! the night swiflty swoops bye and its about 10:30? 

still earl if i may say so myself

so we get up and walk up and down main street let me tell u still freaking out.

so yea then we get in the car and srat to drive home! And i whipped out one of my 80s mixes so were all bumben joan jett when shes like

Wanna put the top down? (were in her moms beamer) im like HEEL YEA!

ahah so we put it down and its like 10;45!!!!!

so we jump in and start to go . Now were blasten the go go's ahah so awesome

then we decide to rent a movie and watch it at her house.........

blah blah blah we drive to her house first to get an expried movie then we drive to myne to get my hollywood card. 

Ok so yea there are always parties going on ubove me where i live so i jump in the car and nats like "when we get back lets go up and say hi lol"

cuz we know most of the peeps up there

so im like fur sure ! and so blah blah blah we go get the movie (chasing liberty)

on our way back stop by at  the party and just chill.

we chilled with xtremely hott chris. and i dont really care if u know him and im saying this but hes really hott lol. 

we played cards with my marilyn cards and just chilled untill like 12 or 1 i dunno

then we finally went up the street to nats fricken mansion and watched the movie.

well half of it at least i fell asleep lol.

so yea i got hoome at around 2;30 

but since we had os much funthat night were gonna take hella roadtrips n stuff liek to hollywood n stuff. cuz were crazy "rebels" like that

fun fun night

then the next day i went to thousand oaks and literally shopped all day again. 

O O O i got bare minerals! so excited. stuff works all good 

so yea uhm thats my weekend shortend of alot of details but yea uget the point lol

well im off to get ready for la school


adios! 

me amigos

i found this in a marilyn monroe forum im a part of. i really love it. im posting it everyhwere lol. hope u enjoy it :) Star on Walk of Fame In an article about how the Walk of Fame in Hollywood has been languishing, doing poorly, etc. I found the conclusion very interesting. This is a bit long, but well worth the read!! Excerpts: I stayed outside under the shade of the palm trees to watch the crowd. I noticed a homeless man with withered legs lower himself out of his wheelchair and on to the ground. He took a plastic tray from underneath the chair loaded with rags, sponges, two spray bottles and a battered metal one. He took one of the bottles and a rag, pressed his face almost into the pavement and began to clean Stephanie Powers' star. Once finished, he dragged himself along the ground to the next star, belonging to Luna Humberto, and cleaned it, too. Done with Luna, he then pulled himself along to the next star, which was right outside the doors to McDonald's. He regarded the star for a moment before spraying it with the bottle and wiping it with the rag. Then he went back to the tray and selected a different rag and a battered metal bottle. Carefully, as if it were liquid gold, he poured a thick polish on to the rag and diligently applied it to the brass elements of the star. He waited patiently for it to dry, then wiped it clean. The brass was gleaming. He then put the bottle and rags back in their tray and moved onto the next star. I walked over to [see] what sort of name could command such special treatment. It was, of course, Marilyn Monroe. [Source: Stuff.com]
